snippet: Ryan Grigson moves to a franchise facing big questions, including whether to build around established quarterback Peyton Manning or Andrew Luck, the probable No. draft pick.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Indianapolis Colts hire Philadelphia Eages executive Ryan Grigson as their new general manager; Grigson will be tasked with deciding on Colts coach and quarterback; other NFL items noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Grigson moves to a franchise facing big questions, including whether to build around established quarterback Peyton Manning or Andrew Luck, the probable No. draft pick.

headline.seo: Colts Hire Grigson, Eagles Executive, as General Manager
headline.main: Colts Hire General Manager to Map Future
headline.print_headline: Colts Hire General Manager to Map Future
